ERROR_ON_PARSE: Grammar cannot be parsed, choose a different parser or grammar!
INFO_BOX_1: - No variables should be named with S'
INFO_BOX_2: - To use the epsilon symbol, just type epsilon
INFO_BOX_3: - To use the 'or' operation use | on the right side
INFO_BOX_4: - All grammar symbols must be separated by ','
INFO_BOX_5: - Use the -> symbol to separate the right side from the left side
INFO_BOX_ERROR: A row can have at most one variable on the left side!
GRAMMAR_INPUT_PROMPT: Type the grammar here, something like: S -> A B | epsilon
DONT_HAVE_ACTION: This parser has no action table!
DONT_HAVE_GOTO: This parser does not have a goTo table!
